MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-DEC-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is power cut in the KY7 and KY8 areas of Glenrothes and Leven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:11pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50 PM on Sunday, 13 December 2020
